extendedInfo.description: A conspiracy throws our kingdom into the most dangerous moment, which needs you and your army to shoulder the responsibility of safeguarding the kingdom. The powerful enemy already launches the attack, which leaves you no choice as you are the last hope of the kingdom. The particular fortress construction mode allows you to build the unique fortress of your own, which will bring you a strong sense of proud especially when seeing tens of thousands of enemies fall in front of your elaborate fortress. Feel free to build walls and fortresses, set up gatehouses, pits, barriers and towers and paint pitch on the ground to launch fire attack against your enemy. You can also build all kinds of buildings to boost your soldier's battle efficiency. The establishment of magic towers enables you to use magic. Arrow towers and round towers of different scale help you to form solid defensive line. You can also have your archers shoot enemies on the wallâ¦ With 22 types of military units and numerous styles of bosses, the game will impress you with rich and skillful playing methods, for example, upgrading your soldiers' level or building function all make your defensive line more strong. Weather your fortress can survive the surrounded enemies? With the vast battlefield and splendid background music, you are sure to throw yourself into this war in the Middle Ages. Story Mode: 10 epic campaigns with 50 levels Glory Mode: Hold fast to your fortress and stand firm against your enemy for 20 days. Features: - 22 types of units - Various Bosses - 47 map types - Superior AI - Unit upgrade mode - Building upgrade mode - Magnificent background music - Auto save ... Thanks for your support. EASYTECH 2011 www.ieasytech.com

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: This game is sick!! I already finished campaign glory and crusader mode. Hope more updates are coming. Sometimes my scrolling gets locked needs an update on that. Also you guys need to add a feature where you can select multiple units at once, I like to build an army and just attack the waves head on just for kicks. other then that no other problems.. Gold is hard to come by. But with a good defense and offense it\'ll be easily rewarded.
reviews.author: Edward S

reviews.title: Vreat game but...
reviews.comment: I can only give 1 star for now.  I Will give 5 stars if I could figure out why I lose controll of the game.  Touch screen pulls to bottom left only and I cant control any of my units.  This is a great game so please fix this issue or let me know if its on my end.  I have no problems like this with any other games.
reviews.author: harold stuart

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I finally found a game with a fresh concept. But is it my phone or is there a problem with the camera of the game as if zooming in? If that is fixed, this game will deserve 5 stars.
reviews.author: Jia Ying Lim

reviews.title: Trash game
reviews.comment: This game has potential in my eyes, but one needs gold, and guess what? Aside from the one Buck you will pay you need to buy gold to keep going in this game. Beating a stage sure gives gold but no where enough to continue. I am stuck in one wave in story, with no gold and keep failing for just to get 100 gold. Either more gold in this game or enable to replay past stages to get gold and upgrade your units. Don\'t waste your dollar in this frustrating game.
reviews.author: Humberto Fierro

reviews.title: Unrealistic moneytization model
reviews.comment: The game looks good but will tank because of the overly greedy pay model. You have to keep paying real money just to pass each level. I don\'t mind paying for games, but this is a terrible business model that ruins an otherwise good game.
reviews.author: Matthew Francis

reviews.title: Copyright of stronghold
reviews.comment: This game is nothing but trash its lines for the charecters are the same as the ones for the PC game stronghold you guys are lucky they didn\'t sue for copyright bitches
reviews.author: carlos Carrillo

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Hey I really really like this game but it messes up all the time so that my scrolling doesn\'t work, I can\'t buy things, I can\'t sell things...please fix I love this game but that is really annoying.
reviews.author: CHUEY KLIEMANN

reviews.title: Very good game
reviews.comment: Great game but I\'m gaining very little money, I\'m looking forward to the next update for new levels and maybe some new soldiers/buildings would be good too.
reviews.author: Ben Brogan

reviews.title: Needs a few tweeks
reviews.comment: Needs a restart level option. More camera angles, or some way of seeing and moving troops who are hidden behind walls and towers more easily. And for the LOVE OF GOD move to slide out menu to the LEFT were it wouldn\'t be in the way. I know you can minimise it but the tick and cross buttons are still in the way. It\'s seems silly to put it on the side of the screen your using. But do that it\'s a defo 5 stars
reviews.author: James Farmer

reviews.title: Zoom issues
reviews.comment: The game is glitched. It works fine until you zoom in or out. The game then thinks that you are always holding down one finger, so there is no way to disable the zoom. It makes the levels unplayable. The only way to fix is to back out and redo the level, and not zoom at all.. Completely broken.
reviews.author: Nathaniel Bynum

reviews.title: Good game bad controls
reviews.comment: Good game,but fix the stupid controls. the touch control messes up after a couple of minutes to cause you to not be able to purchase items and move any units.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: EXCELLENT!!
reviews.comment: Seriously, this game is best game I ever play!! Recomend it to everyone who loves middle age strategy war game!! But there is one problem that sometimes, the control of screen is randomly moving around when you accidently move around the screen with two fingers. Its really hard to fix it once the control is lost. And some people say it is hard to get golds but actually it is easy to get golds because once you fail you can restart with golds you just earned from your lost battle. So c\'mon! ! Give it a try!
reviews.author: Minseok Kim

reviews.title: Controll BREAK & battery DRAIN
reviews.comment: Hello ???  Have you, the makers of this potentialy fun game read your reviews?  After a few rounds the touch screen does NOT work right. Other complain for a long time. TIME TO FIX AND UPGRADE PLEASE!! ALSO it DRAINS BATTERY much much faster than anything...  v
reviews.author: Mark Richard

reviews.title: Cool game
reviews.comment: I always want to built a castle then the enemy will attack you and you will defend it, it\'s very cool and awesome.
reviews.author: Edrian Notarte

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: But please how to play in Glory mode?
reviews.author: claudio beretta

reviews.comment: Fun little game, but the camera messes up too much with zooming and not being able to see certain areas. Fix this and I will give 5 stars.\tThe game itself is really fun, and does require a bit of tatical sense when it comes to building your castle, placing your troops. The reviewer that says this game does not give you enough gold is an idiot. I am already on round 8 which each round has 5 stages within those, and I have had very minimal to no trouble gold shortages to complete the level. Sometimes the default setup of your castle and troops is not always the best remeber that. Biggest flaw in game is the camera messing up though. Please fix.
reviews.author: Christopher Hassler

reviews.title: Fun but crashes
reviews.comment: The game otself is fun and tactical. I like how its not just purely a tower defence, you can actually purchase units and move them around. Scrolling and camera is a bit off but the bigest problem is crashes and freezes. Game locks up every 15min or so, just enough to finish a round and i have to restart the game.
reviews.author: Valik Toma

reviews.title: Great but...
reviews.comment: This game\'s great but you should be able to select multiple units at once. It would be great if you added a campaign where the player is the attacker or the AI and the player attack eachother! But great game to say the least!
reviews.author: Kyle Egan

reviews.title: F****** cool as games
reviews.comment: Its a f****** balls game I\'m nervous I have never found anybody else I\'ve never found any good as games like this they should f****** make a bigger game or for the ps3 or xbox until I go hunt Gmail com 300 but in small addition its a m************ call as a f****** game
reviews.author: carlos preciado

reviews.comment: Great game.. price for leveling up units is well balanced.
reviews.author: Kris Bennett
